mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction( tran_no , prod_no , buyer_id , payment_option , receiver_name, receiver_phone, demailaddr, dlvy_request, tran_status_code,order_data,dlvy_date,quantity ) VALUES (seq_transaction_tran_no.NEXTVAL, #{purchaseProd.prodNo}, #{buyer.userId}, #{paymentOption}, #{receiverName}, #{receiverPhone}, #{divyAddr}, #{divyRequest},'1', SYSDATE, #{divyDate},#{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT tran_no , prod_no , buyer_id , payment_option , receiver_name, receiver_phone, demailaddr, dlvy_request, tran_status_code,order_data,dlvy_date, quantity FROM transaction WHERE tran_no = #{value}
